General.Name: Infomedia Press Limited
General.Description: Infomedia Press Limited does not have significant operations. Previously, it was involved in printing business. The company was formerly known as Infomedia 18 Limited and changed its name to Infomedia Press Limited in July 2012. The company was incorporated in 1955 and is based in Mumbai, India. Infomedia Press Limited is a subsidiary of Network18 Media & Investments Limited.
